If Knowledge Base selected
The supported target functions are;
List segment folders: Listing up folders that exist in the parent segment
List by folder: Listing up instances that exist in a particular folder. This requires folder id
List attributes: Retrieve the attributed definitions configured on the parent segment config
List behaviors: Retrieve the behavior definitions configured on the parent segment config
Get segment: Retrieve the metadata of a particular segment. This requires segment id
Get journey: Retrieve the metadata of a particular journey. This requires journey id
Get audience: Retrieve the metadata of the parent segment config. This requires journey id
Get query: Retrieve the count SQL of a particular segment. This requires segment id
Query data directly: Issue a SQL to the parent segment data
Query segment analytics: Issue a SQL to analyze on a particular segment. This requires segment id
